title: Experimental Decision-Making Tool Design for Microalgae Cultivation and Biogas Digestate Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practitioners have experience operating biogas treatment systems in environmental fields but lack familiarity with microalgae cultivation techniques and data-driven decision-making tools

learning_goals: The impact of physicochemical properties of biogas digestate (temperature, pH, electrical conductivity, etc.) on microalgae growth can be analyzed
Core parameters (PCI, nitrate concentration, etc.) of decision support tools (DST) based on experimental data can be identified and optimal operating conditions derived
Learners can develop problem-solving strategies for the microalgae cultivation process using virtual lab simulations on an LMS platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
